name: Uncle Dale's Farm - Ludum Dare 46
description:
Take over Uncle Dale's Farm while he's away on a 7 day fishing trip. Plant seeds, water your crops, keep bugs away with pesticide and harvest the crops.

When he returns, Dale expects to see a farm in perfect shape - so give your best!

Features

  • different crops with different growth speeds
  • when it rains, your crops are watered automatically
  • 3 endings - good, bad and  a secret one

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • walk into tools to pick them up/switch/put them back
  • SPACE to use tools
